entry.title: Kubus 8, White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 320.00

Mogens Lassen designed the very first Kubus candle holder in 1962 for the interior of a restaurant in northern Zealand, Denmark. The geometric candleholder series has since become a much-loved icon of Danish design thanks to its timeless, Modernist form and enduring function. Kubus 8 is a mood-enhancing addition to any space. With room for eight candles it creates a cosy atmosphere wherever it is placed. It is available in a range of metals and finishes.

entry.title: Twist Tapered Candles, Set of 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 34.00

Emitting a warm glow when lit, Twist is a new rendition of traditional taper candles. Shaped into an architectural form, the winding silhouette adds a fresh and modern feel to spaces. Made from plant-based wax, Twist is available in a four-piece set in neutral, warm or cool colours.

entry.title: Spire Smooth Tapered Candles, Set of 6
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 36.00

Elegant and ambient, the Spire Candle is a new take on the classic votive, elevating any setting with its elongated, tapered form. Made with consideration from plant-based wax and available in a set of six, the unscented design is offered in three different colourways: neutral, warm and cool.

entry.title: Kubus Line
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 135.00 - 170.00 (5 variants)

Mogens Lassen designed the very first Kubus candle holder in 1962 for the interior of a restaurant in northern Zealand, Denmark. Since then, it has evolved into a series of iconic geometric designs that decorate spaces across the world. With its Modernist form and enduring function, Kubus Line is a mood-enhancing addition to any space, creating a cosy atmosphere wherever it is placed. It is available in a range of metals and finishes.

entry.title: Light'In Candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 10.00

A set of white candles for light'in, made from stearin and with a burn time of 7, 40 and 66 hours depending on the size.

entry.title: Light'In
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 160.00 - 230.00 (3 variants)

Light’in is a decorative lantern, suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. Made from glass and powder coated metal, its simple yet impactful look brings atmospheric glow to any setting.

entry.title: Kubus T
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 90.00 - 100.00 (4 variants)

Kubus T is a simple tealight design framed by a three-dimensional cube. Available in a range of expressions – including powder coated metal, burnished copper and polished brass — it elevates spaces with it graphic simplicity.

entry.title: Kubus Micro, set of 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 65.00 - 105.00 (3 variants)

Kubus Micro is a stylish and slight version of the first Kubus candle holder Mogens Lassen designed in 1962. Profiling the same geometry as its predecessor on a smaller scale, the minimalist design adds to the atmosphere of a space. Offered as a set of two, Kubus Micro looks equally striking used alone, styled in clusters or grouped together with other candle holders from the Kubus collection.

entry.title: Kubus 8 Raw, Limited Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 810.00

Reflecting Mogens Lassen’s functionalist approach to design, the Kubus 8 candle holder from 1962 is as relevant today as ever. To mark the 60th anniversary of the now iconic design, the Kubus 8 Raw was launched in 2022. As its name suggests, it has been left untreated, acquiring a beautiful patina over time. Undergoing 16 individual crafting processes, the Kubus 8 Raw is made entirely by hand, cut, welded, soldered, sanded and polished using traditional techniques. A single piece takes a skilled craftsperson an average of 45 minutes to make.

entry.title: Kubus 8
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 320.00 - 465.00 (3 variants)

Mogens Lassen designed the very first Kubus candle holder in 1962 for the interior of a restaurant in northern Zealand, Denmark. The geometric candleholder series has since become a much-loved icon of Danish design thanks to its timeless, Modernist form and enduring function. Kubus 8 is a mood-enhancing addition to any space. With room for eight candles it creates a cosy atmosphere wherever it is placed. It is available in a range of metals and finishes.

entry.title: Kubus 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 175.00 - 255.00 (8 variants)

Mogens Lassen designed the very first Kubus candle holder in 1962 for the interior of a restaurant in northern Zealand, Denmark. The geometric-inspired series has since become a much-loved icon of Danish design thanks to its timeless, Modernist form and enduring function. Kubus 4 is a mood-enhancing addition to any space, creating a cosy atmosphere wherever it is placed. It is available in a range of metals and finishes, including zinc and powder-coated metal in ivory or olive green.

entry.title: Kubus 1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 90.00 - 100.00 (4 variants)

Mogens Lassen designed the iconic Kubus candle holder in 1962 for the interior of a restaurant in northern Zealand, Denmark. The geometric piece is today an icon of Danish design thanks to its timeless, Modernist form and enduring function. A mood-enhancing addition to any space, it continues to create a cosy atmosphere at a table — and still decorates the very same restaurant for which it was first designed.

entry.title: Kubus Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jacob Manz
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 60.00 - 105.00 (6 variants)

Base was designed in 2009 as a protective accessory for the Kubus and Line candle holders, to protect surfaces from damage from dripping wax. Base beautifully frames a candle holder, emphasising its simple design, and has been created with the greatest respect for Mogens Lassen – both as an architect and a designer.

entry.title: Kubus Micro Candles, 9 pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 21.00

These little candles are a perfect match for the Kubus Micro candleholder. The package consists of 9 white candles.

entry.title: Kubus Candles, 16 pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 21.00

A set of 16 stearin wax candles, designed to fit the Kubus and Line candle holders. With six hours of burn time, the atmospheric candles measure 20 cm in length.

entry.title: Olfacte Scented Candle, Wet Ink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 40.00 - 65.00 (2 variants)

“Thought to page, inspiration strikes, ideas emerge.”

Scent Notes
Top notes - juniper berry, cypress, grapefruit, fresh mint.
Middle notes - cedarwood, sage, passionfruit.
Base notes - cannabis, amber, vetiver.

Designed to refine the senses and rouse inspiration, Wet Ink greets with a bouquet of fresh mint and uplifting grapefruit. Accompanied by subtle notes of cedarwood and amber and a hint of sweet cannabis to create, focus or effect a vision.

Each candle is responsibly made using natural essential oils and plant-based wax. Free from parabens and phthalates.

entry.title: Olfacte Scented Candle, Private View
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 40.00 - 135.00 (3 variants)

“The secret self, sides reserved, an intimacy unfolds.”

Scent Notes
Top notes - eucalyptus, mandarin zest.
Middle notes - patchouli, vetiver, cypress.
Base notes - leather, palo santo, vanilla, cedarwood.

This romantic scent is designed for our most intimate quarters. Private View strikes connection: mind, body and desire. Mandarin zest meets a veil of smoky palo santo and earthy vetiver, layered with grounding leather and delicate vanilla undertones.
Each candle is responsibly made using natural essential oils and plant-based wax. Free from parabens and phthalates.

entry.title: Olfacte Scented Candle, Midnight Soak
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 40.00 - 135.00 (3 variants)

“When night falls, exhale deep, taking a moment to let go.”

Scent Notes
Top notes - bitter orange, lavandin grosso, fig.
Middle notes - geranium, rose petals, hay.
Base notes - cedarwood, moss, white musk.

Bathe the senses in luxurious fig, herbaceous lavandin grosso and bitter orange – a deeply relaxing combination that elicits a state of calm. As all falls quiet, sink into a sensuous secondary layer of fresh rose petals, white musk and moss.
Each candle is responsibly made using natural essential oils and plant-based wax. Free from parabens and phthalates.

entry.title: Olfacte Scented Candle, En Passant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 40.00 - 65.00 (2 variants)

“A feeling renewed, fresh and awakened, vivaciously verdant.”

Scent Notes

Top notes - grapefruit, eucalyptus, ginger.
Middle notes - lavandin super, jasmine petals, hyacinth.
Base notes - geranium, wild moss, cedarwood.

“En Passant” simply means “in passing.” A moment in time, like a stroll through the garden after spring rain. This purifying, floral scent invites you to stop and take in the scents of hyacinth, jasmine petals and geranium. The fragrance concludes with grounding arboreal notes of wild moss and cedarwood.

Each candle is responsibly made using natural essential oils and plant-based wax. Free from parabens and phthalates.

entry.title: Olfacte Scented Candle, Chapter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 40.00 - 135.00 (3 variants)

“For turning a page, ending a day or starting anew.”

Scent Notes
Top notes - lemon zest, hinoki (Japanese cypress), cardamom.
Middle notes - patchouli, sequoia.
Base notes - cedarwood, amber, musk.

Chapter presents a balanced composition to start the day, set the mood at nightfall or create a moment in between. Top notes of Japanese hinoki wood, lemon and cardamom are rooted in the splendour of sequoia, patchouli and a subtle amber base.
Each candle is responsibly made using natural essential oils and plant-based wax. Free from parabens and phthalates.

entry.title: Clip Candle Holder, Wall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 34.00 - 65.00 (4 variants)

Inspired by medieval candle holder designs, the Clip Wall Candleholder in black powder-coated metal or gleaming brass is simple in form yet powerful in expression. Exploring equilibrium, its finely turned metal frame holds a drip tray that seems to float on air.

entry.title: Clip Candle Holder, Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 30.00 - 175.00 (4 variants)

An effortless way to display candles, the Clip Table Candleholder is understated yet intriguing. Reworking medieval candleholders and sconces while exploring an equilibrium of form, the slender frame balances a practical drip tray for an ethereal expression.

entry.title: Clip Candle Care Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle Kit
Price: 65.00 - 105.00 (2 variants)

Designed for optimal candle care and performance, the four-piece Candle Care Kit includes elegant tools in powder-coated metal. A candle snuffer, wick trimmer and pick ensure less smoke and sooting, better burning and the cleaner extinguishing of flames, while the accompanying tray stores the items when not in use.

entry.title: Flambeau Candle Holder, Wall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 95.00 - 190.00 (4 variants)

Inspired by French modernist lighting fixtures and designed to resemble a flickering flame, Flambeau is a sculptural design with playful presence. The metal backplate magnifies and reflects candlelight to create intriguing shadows and beautiful ambience.

entry.title: Flambeau Candle Holder, Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 135.00 - 180.00 (4 variants)

Inspired by French modernist lighting fixtures and designed to resemble a flickering flame, Flambeau is a sculptural design with playful presence. The metal backplate magnifies and reflects candlelight to create intriguing shadows and beautiful ambience.
